name: MTLFence
desc: An object that can capture, track, and manage resource dependencies across command encoders.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The device object that created the fence.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the fence.

items.name: struct MTLRenderStages
items.desc: The render stages at which a synchronization command is triggered.
